question.title: Kotlin project is not correctly loaded after IntelliJ update
question.body:
I updated my IntelliJ and since then my Kotlin projects in Micronaut won't load properly. When I click somewhere it gives me a popup: "Cannot find declaration to go to."

Root Application.class is not loaded so I also have red cross on Application start button in IntelliJ, but I am able to click on green arrow next to that button and run project normally.

I have already tried to:

  • restart IntelliJ
  • remove .idea directories and reload projects
  • invalidate caches and reload projects
  • reinstall IntelliJ
  • reinstall JDK

Any idea how to fix it please?
